statements: UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET amount = 10.5 WHERE transaction_id = 100

UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET from_address = '0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890', to_address = '0xa1b2c3d4e5f6a1b2c3d4e5f6a1b2c3d4e5f6', block_number = 100000 WHERE transaction_hash = '0xabcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890';

UPDATE audit_trail SET action = 'Approved', user_id = 123, timestamp = '2023-05-16 14:30:00' WHERE audit_id = 'b6f57b00-25ec-4b06-8b84-3ad6c8245891';
